mapper.insert: insert into CHAT_ROOM ( CR_NO, PRO_NO, MEM_NO, CR_TIME ) VALUES ( concat("CR", IFNULL((select MAX(cast(replace(CR_NO, "CR", "") AS unsigned))+1 FROM CHAT_ROOM A), 1)), #{proNo}, (SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}), date_format(now(), "%Y%m%d%H%i%s") );
mapper.select:
SELECT C.CR_NO , C.PRO_NO , C.MEM_NO , C.CR_TIME , M.MEM_ID , M.MEM_NICK , IFNULL(M.MEM_IMAGE, "따봉도치.jpg") MEM_IMAGE , P.PRO_NAME , P.PRO_TSC , (SELECT CODE FROM CODE WHERE CONCAT(CO_TYPE, CO_NO) = P.PRO_TSC) PRO_TSC_CODE FROM CHAT_ROOM C JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO JOIN MEMBERS M
ON P.PRO_WR = M.MEM_ID WHERE C.MEM_NO = (SELECT MEM_NO FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId})
ON C.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE C.PRO_NO IN ((SELECT PRO_NO FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_WR = #{memId}))
mapper.insert: insert into CHATTING(CR_NO, PRO_NO, MEM_ID, MSG_CONTENT, MSG_IMG, MSG_TIME, REAL_TIME) VALUES (#{CR_NO}, #{PRO_NO}, #{MEM_ID}, #{MSG_CONTENT}, #{MSG_IMG}, #{MSG_TIME}, date_format(NOW(), "%Y%m%d%H%i%s"));
mapper.select: SELECT CR_NO , PRO_NO , MEM_ID , (SELECT MEM_NICK FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID) MEM_NICK , MSG_CONTENT , MSG_IMG , MSG_TIME , REAL_TIME FROM CHATTING C WHERE CR_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY REAL_TIME DESC;
